WHY DISTURB LORD ADMIRAL EH, EH!?"}} '''Lord Admiral Imp''' is a character in {{poe2}}. ## Background Once-mascot from the infamous ''Firebrand'', Lord Admiral Imp has recently thrown in with a group of xaurips and is trying to steal a boat to flee the city. ## Interactions {{Interactions |companion = |wares = |stronghold = |rest = |quests_started = |quests_involved =[Bounty - Lord Admiral Imp](/bountyLordAdmiralImp/) |none = |other = }} ## =Quests = * [Bounty - Lord Admiral Imp](/bountyLordAdmiralImp/): He can be found on the far east side of [Queen's Berth](/queensBerth/), just under the bridge to exit East out of the map. WHY DISTURB LORD ADMIRAL EH, EH!?"}} '''Lord Admiral Imp''' is a character in {{poe2}}. ==Background== Once-mascot from the infamous ''Firebrand'', Lord Admiral Imp has recently thrown in with a group of xaurips and is trying to steal a boat to flee the city. ==Interactions== {{Interactions |companion = |wares = |stronghold = |rest = |quests_started = |quests_involved =[[Bounty - Lord Admiral Imp]] |none = |other = }} ===Quests=== * [[Bounty - Lord Admiral Imp]]: He can be found on the far east side of [[Queen's Berth]], just under the bridge to exit East out of the map.
